txt.en: 'You there, adventurer! Looking for some coin in return for a simple job? It's nearly time for the workers in the Camenduril fields outside the city to have their meal. Take up this basket and bring their meals to them, and I'll reward you for your time.'
'Oh, thank you. My stomach recently growled so loud I thought Orcs were attacking.'
'Time to eat already? I suppose I can take a break.'
'You saved me quite a bit of time today! I shall take the basket, thank you.'
Farmers in the Camenduril fields outside the city of Calembel are growing hungry.
You have fed all of the farmers working in the fields. You should return the basket to Trevadron, in Calembel.
'Is this from Trevadron? Please send my thanks.'
'I'm famished! Do give it here, won't you?'
Trevadron has asked you bring meals to the farmers in the fields below Calembel.
Trevadron has asked you to bring meals to farmers outside the walls of Calembel. You should pick up the picnic basket and bring them their meals.\n\nTï¿½
